Author: BEDBulimic
Text: if you want something that doesn’t have to be kept in the fridge and finished in a few days:   liquid aminos, apple cider vinegar, balsamic vinegar, lemon/lime juice, mustard, frozen fruit (raspberries as garnish? yummy in summer), PB2 or tamari, nutritional yeast, garlic salt, nando’s peri peri chicken salt (hehe), tj’s everything but the bagel seasoning, an innumerable number of spices

Author: fishonthesun
Text: You can make spinach salads!! I would look up some recipes- personally I'm a fan of fruit, tangy cheese like goat cheese or feta, and some type of nut like walnut of sunflower seeds yum. Might not be very good w/o a dressing, but you can make an at home dressing or even squeeze some fresh lemon juice on top, oo gourmet
